attributes.action: Referendum for assisted dying, let the public decide.
attributes.background: Largest ever poll on assisted dying shows 82% of public support Lord Falconer’s proposed change in the law, yet MPs decided not to pass the  Law.  Listen to the public, let us decide.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106652

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
